question: Muhammed bin Tughlaq set up the department of agricultural was known by:
explanation: Sultan Muhammed bin Tughlaq set up Diwan-i-Kohi, a new department of agriculture. The main purpose of this department  was to bring more land under cultivation by giving direct help to peasants. Though, due to corruption and misappropriation,  the whole plan failed and the peasants of doab area revolted.
